bioconda.name: bioconductor-inspect
bioconda.summary: Modeling RNA synthesis, processing and degradation with RNA-seq data

biotools.summary: INference of Synthesis, Processing and dEgradation rates in Course-Time experiments analyses 4sU-seq and RNA-seq time-course data in order to evaluate synthesis, processing and degradation rates and asses via modeling the rates that determines changes in mature mRNA levels.

bioschemas.name: INSPEcT
bioschemas.summary: INference of Synthesis, Processing and dEgradation rates in Course-Time experiments analyses 4sU-seq and RNA-seq time-course data in order to evaluate synthesis, processing and degradation rates and asses via modeling the rates that determines changes in mature mRNA levels.
